definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:reload_gun</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§bRechargement</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Magazine</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Bullet</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
